content: the newest addition to our crochet gnome along is the sweet butterfly gnome this adorable crochet butterfly will brighten your mood and make you happy whenever you see it > the free pattern is available on our blog link text 1 the pdf pattern includes instructions for the following - the crochet butterfly gnome - the small crochet butterfly applique - the small crochet flowers in the pdf you will find plenty of pictures to help you throughout the pattern materials worsted weight yarn- yarn bee soft and sleek 100% acrylic 5 0 oz/142 g 232 yds/ 213 m solid colors- pink 70-80 gr yellow 10 gr darker pink 10 gr peach color 10 gr a small amount of beige and white for the nose and hands crochet hook size 3 5mm/ us crochet hook size e poly fiber fill for stuffing tapestry needle 1 https //www passionatecrafter com/butterfly-gnome-free-crochet-pattern/
